article.Heading: Budget 2016 eBook: Cheer for farmers; peanuts for salaried
article.Summary: Moneycontrol has put together an ebook that compiles our incisive coverage on Budget Day, and packs in articles, features and views on the Budget and examines how it will impact the economy.
article.Body:
Finance Minister Arun Jaitley pulled out all stops to present a Budget that strived to counter the rural slowdown. The Budget also focused on infrastructure in a big way. The focus on both areas meant there was not much scope for tax sops for the common man.

Moneycontrol has put together an ebook that compiles our incisive coverage on Budget Day, and packs in articles, features and views on the Budget and examines how it will impact the economy.
